title: The Master of Monsters
description: And she thought math homework was the end of the world! -- Eri Seruma and her friends have been thrown into a mystical fight against the Dark Lord Viktor Sufocus and his army of Monsters. Time is running out as the kids face an unbelievable modern day fantasy involving monsters, magic, and a prophecy of the End of Days at the hand of a foretold 'Child of Destiny'.
author: Millie Blackwood
